title: Eldritch Intellect
text:
This model gains +2 SH when resolving a Basic Attack against it from a model with Psionic.

This model gains +1 attack die when attacking a model of a particular race (elves, dwarfs, humans, minotaurs, orcs, goblins, undead, chimera or demons). This model cannot have Enmity against its own race.
